content:
Can we make different notification message styles for Notification bot. for marking the topic resolved/unresolved or moving the topic.
Like discord welcomes new member, in a single line with the necessary link.
image.png
This way it would look different from other messages.
What are everyone's views on this?

We have a plan to support that sort of thing from a database perspective; currently blocked on database migration details. I'm not sure that it'd actually be helpful for all classes of notification bot messages, but the resolve/unresolve topic notifications seem like a good candidate.

(There's a lot of hidden complex that comes with doing that since one still wants to be able to interact with those by deleting them at least, etc., so they still need to be half a real message; thus it's probably not a high value per unit work area to work on).
